website_summaries.verdict: An expertly constructed iPad stand that is great for watching movies, reading and much more.
pros: Can be adjusted from 0° to 100° to 10 different viewing angles
Rubber pad on the bottom of the stand ensures your iPad won't wobble
Universal compatibility with iPads and other devices
Foldable, so you can take the stand with you on the go
cons: Not as strong as comparable options

website_summaries.verdict: Sturdily built, adjustable-angle stand with high level of device compatibility.
pros: Widely compatible, can use with all 4 to 10.5 inch devices
Conveniently portable, can be folded and carried in pocket
Adjustable viewing angles along with vertical or horizontal device placement
Rubber pad on bottom holds stand and device securely in place
Hands-free experience watching videos, reading, browsing the web
cons: Smaller than some expected, as a number of purchasers found that the lip of the stand will not fit certain devices that are in a case

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality stand. However, it's quite small and more accommodating for a smart phone than a ten inch tablet. It's my fault for not reading the dimensions. Just be warned, a kid's fire tablet, 8 inch with case, hangs off really bad. That being said, it seems like it will stay in place. It just didn't seem as sturdy as I would have liked. But that's only a function of it being smaller than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: E. Joseph

customer_reviews.title: This is the one.
customer_reviews.text: Read a ton of tablet stand reviews before I clicked to purchase. This one, the UGreen is it. Works great with my Note 4 phone and my Samsung 12 inch tablet. I use it mostly on airplanes. And it works on my lap and on a table, i.e. take off and landing tables have to be up. Been using it about 3 months. Appears to be made such that it will last. However, as tough as I am on gadgets when I fly, if I can get a year out of this thing it is a winner. And let's get real, it's only 9 bucks. And white works so I can find the thing in my bag. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Bride

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant idea for holding my iPad mini!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! I read my iPad mini when I go to bed. I may start out on my back reading, but I prefer to read, lying on my side. It was difficult keep my hand to hold my head and to hold the iPad, read and swipe to change the pages. This has solved all of my problems. I can put my iPad mini on the stand (putting the long side in the "tray"), and I can easily read, swipe the pages and keep my head propped up with my other hand. I love this!!! What a brilliant idea!!
customer_reviews.author: SC Girl

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Solution!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and have already put another in my shopping cart for my bedroom tablet. I had been struggling with both my new iPad 2018 model as well as both of my 9” Kindle Fire Tablets - no matter which case I’d gotten, none of them held the positions I needed. This little stand is already proving itself with my iPad so I know it will work for my Fire Tablet too. LOVE IT! It’s holding the position (with the case on the device yet too!) and, it’s stable on a slightly rounded armchair. Simple, tiny and mighty! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Von ReederTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Awesome iPad - iPhone stand.
customer_reviews.text: This stand holder is great for your smartphone or tablet. I use with my iPhone or iPad, it is adjustable, looks great, awesome quality, simple to adjust, very sturdy and in my opinion it have that Apple look that most are searching for in a product. It can hold easily my iPhone 7 as well as my iPad 9.7 inch retina, also I use it with my iPod classic when listening to music with my bookshelves speakers. You can't go wrong with this stand.
customer_reviews.author: Nestmac

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit my iPad with case
customer_reviews.text: Would be really nice if it could fit my iPad with a case on. Also feels really cheap. Might return it
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Small, simple, works great. I got the white and the design is very attractive. If you are the type to constantly adjust the angle, I suspect you might wear out the hinge, otherwise it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Ahnimas

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I loved this little stand and it worked great for a while. I used it with my iPad and with my phone. I dropped it once, and it broke. One of the little silver end caps popped out. I put it back, but now it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Dede C.

customer_reviews.title: I am the worst at reading descritions
customer_reviews.text: I am the worst at reading descritions, so this is smaller that I anticipated. Besides that it’s pretty awesome. It’s sturdy and well made and the packaging it came in was great. It’s holding my iPad Pro 12.9” no problem and you can set at different levels which is great! This is my back up after I broke the hard case on my Otter Box. I didn’t want to spend $100+ on another one. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Leticia

customer_reviews.title: Compact and handy
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my 2017 iPad 9.7, even with a folio style case on (although it does need to be firmly seated as the supporting “lip” is not wide enough to easily accommodate a thick case). Compact and attractive. I have a feeling the “racketing” support leg is not going to hold in intermediate position with extended use. Probably will wear out. Not a big deal for me as I use it fully opened anyway. Also, as pretty obvious from the picture, this is not for lap use. It needs to rest on a solid surface.
customer_reviews.author: Ummagumma

customer_reviews.title: Saves space and does it's job
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something that saves space for my iPad when watching videos and came across this. While it is sturdy and saves space it's a little unstable when you want to press the round button in landscape mode the unit wants to shift. Not that big of an issue and most likely won't be a problem in portrait mode. I also found that the tablet will not fit if in a cave with a cover only very thin cases will fit or take the tablet out completely. Nice that it's small and folds up for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Bladestryke

customer_reviews.title: Great stand! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I have an old iPad that has one of those case that covers the screen and doubles as stand for landscape view but it wasn't very sturdy. So I thought I needed a new case then stumbled across this stand during my search and got this instead. It has so many different angles that you can adjust and most importantly, it doesn't have a size limitation! It works for my phone, my iPad, my husband's tablet, etc. It is sturdy so you know it won't give out if you were to leave the iPad on there overnight. It is definitely the best one I have ever had! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I bought another one
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light-weight and convenient way to hold an iPad or iPhone on a solid surface. I needed something to hold my iPad for when I am cooking with an online recipe or one off my app. This is perfect -- it takes up very little counter space but holds it securely and at a convenient angle (which is easily adjustable, btw). It holds the iPad very sturdily. It also closes up and fits well in a nearby kitchen drawer, making it convenient to use. I bought another one to use in my craft room upstairs -- I use it to watch recorded online shows, something to keep me company while sewing.
customer_reviews.author: wonder time

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE BEST-- AND I'VE TRIED THEM ALL
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST IPAD STAND! FIRST IT IS REASONABLY PRICED. SECOND IT IS GOOD QUALITY. IT IS SMALL AND COLLAPSES WHICH MEANS YOU CAN BRING IT WITH YOU WHEN YOU TRAVEL. ALSO ONE OF THE BEST FEATURES IS IT IS TOTALLY ADJUSTABLE. FOR INSTANCE I HAD IT ON THE DESK AND THERE WAS A REFLECTION IN THE IPAD. BY ADJUSTING THE STAND THE GLARE WAS GONE. THE OTHER THING THAT'S UNIQUE ABOUT IT IS THAT IT WORK GREAT IN BED! AND THAT IS BECAUSE IT CAN BE ADJUSTED SO IT WILL NOT TIP OVER. THAT IS WHY THIS IS THE PERFECT STAND FOR YOUR IPAD. NO OTHER STAND HAS ALL OF THESE FEATURES!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but slides on tabletops easily
customer_reviews.text: This thing is only $12 but they're definitely making bank on this product -- it probably costs them 25¢ to make. It's just two pieces of plastic and a hinge, with some grippy silicone material on one end so it doesn't slide. However, it really needs that silicone material on the other leg as well because this product still slides on smooth tables far too easily if you ask me. It's not feasible because of the thinness of the edge and how it collapses together to add rubber feet, but maybe some silicone grip tape could work.
customer_reviews.author: Reason

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. These are great. They're adjustable which most aren't. The Amazon 9" tablet as well as iPhones fit perfectly. Makes movie watching, using speakerphone, and listening to music easy & convenient. Looks modern and sleek too. 5stars
customer_reviews.author: dakco

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME LITTLE STANDS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these very sturdy, easy to use, light weight, easy to take along, little phone stands. They're a little larger than necessary for just a normal size cell phone, but I like the size - it's still pretty small and it makes it more stable. It works great for me Kindle, too. I assume it would also work for a tablet. I liked the first so much that I bought another just for the convenience. I'm back to buy yet another to keep at my office. They're easy to transport, I'd just rather not have to. I have a blue one, the white one, and now I'm ordering the black one. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful

customer_reviews.title: Holds my iPad pro 12" and 10" just fine. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Stand works just as you would expect. Holds my iPad pro 12" and 10" just fine. Very sturdy, and rubber grips are a nice touch. Would definitely reccomend this to anyone looking for a slim small stand.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Smith

customer_reviews.title: Even works with an otter box case on my ipad
customer_reviews.text: My kindergarten aged son is doing Zoom school during the quarantine. We have been using an ipad because it is easier to mute and unmute with the ipad than with a desktop computer. I have an otter box case on my ipad to protect it. My son was having trouble with using the ipad without knocking it over. We tried many ways to prop up the screen. This holder is small, lightweight, and sturdy. It is exactly what we needed. The price is very good also. I highly recommend this holder if your child is doing zoom on an ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Woldow

customer_reviews.title: Highly, highly, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a selection of tablet holders to try -- foam triangles, bean bags, the lot -- and added this at the last minute. It turned out to be my favorite, by far! I needed something I could use sitting in bed, propped up on a pillow in my lap. I thought for sure this would be too unstable, but it's actually *more* stable than all of the others! The widely adjustable angle makes it 100% usable, 100% of the time. Highly, highly, *highly* recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alleeum

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: Small, light, and cheap! What more could I ask for. It folds relatively flat and holds my 10" tablet, both horizontally and vertically, great. Keep in mind, if you have a pop socket or case, it may hinder the performance as the lip area is relatively small. It can go to almost vertical to about a 30 degree angle when open fully. It has grippys in the base so it doesn't slip. It holds in place via internal notches, so it clicks into each locking position. Overall, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Py

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet stand in every way
customer_reviews.text: I find this stand to be very sturdy, attractive and a great size that does not take up a lot of space. It safely holds my phone and my tablet as well. I find that I can safely charge my phone while lying it on the long side since there is no hole in the bottom of the stand. I prefer charing it this way or I can charge it from the top so that not having a hole at the bottom of the stand in not a problem. The stand is very stable and has a non slip insert on the bottom. Great stand for a great price. I would definitely recommend this stand to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Alex Medge

customer_reviews.title: Not for a kindle
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be perfect for holding my kindle, but for me it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this stand. This lil buddy is a great purchase to give your device some leverage and support for a variation of needs. I love how compact yet sturdy and durable this item is. I purchased them primarily as tablet stands for my 8 and 5 year olds but they are actually being used by the whole family so Ill be ordering a couple more soon! Shipping speed was a tad bit slower than my amazing Prime, However, UGREEN GROUP LIMITED made it all worth the wait. Thx Guys ;-) <3 JaZzYBeLLE
customer_reviews.author: JaZzyBeLLe

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for an Ipad and Iphone.
customer_reviews.text: We first bought one, then two and now we have four of these. Not only are they well made, sturdy and easily adjustable but the hole in the hmiddle of the holder is let's anyone plug in an external power supply without losing any maneuverability. The material used in the gripper handles offer a firm support. Why do we have so many? One for me, one for my wife and two for the road. PW/Arlington, VA.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W / Virginia

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this phone/tablet holder-stand!
customer_reviews.text: This little stand works great for my Amazon Fire 8HD as well as for my iPhone 6s plus. I used it last night to read an ebook in bed and cannot believe how great it worked. How did I get along without this handy device? I love it! It does all the things that the covers of my devices promise to do, but seem to fail at. It adjusts forward and back so smoothly that I plan to use it for Zoom meetings also.
customer_reviews.author: B J Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, adjustable, fold flat
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this stand. I liked the first one and decided I needed a second. It works great for my phone even when my phone has a case and a pop socket and it also works great for my tablet (Galaxy Tab A) even in it’s case. The stand is very sturdy and adjustable. I keep one next to my bed and the other on my office to hold my phone. It’s also small enough and folds flat for travel. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: climb.a.tree

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Engineered
customer_reviews.text: I bought the larger one to accommodate all my mobile devices. It was a good decision. It clicks for different angles. It's secure. I bought it so I can view live streaming from bed and at my desk and patio table. This is a very well made gadget. It's a nice design. I like that it has slip-proof rubberized material on the underside and where the tablet and phone rest.
customer_reviews.author: Enclosed Garden

customer_reviews.title: Not durable to withstand the weight of an iPad.
customer_reviews.text: This iPad holder was ok initially. I haven’t had it that long or used it for very long. But, the slightest touch and it cannot stay at the desired incline, it just falls way back. Which is frustrating while in use. Granted it isn’t very expensive. So, I guess one gets what they’ve paid for, which is an inexpensive plastic ipad stand. It is very small and not very durable. I’d say if your using it for your iPhone it’s probably ok. But, beware if it’s for iPad us. It just isn’t strong enough to hold the weight of an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Dboliner

customer_reviews.title: Plastic. Not very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stand because I bought some Ugreen audio and video cables before on Amazon and those cables were of great quality. However, this Ugreen stand is made of cheap plastic. Very light. Not sturdy. I am very disappointed and returned it. There are other stands made of solid aluminum at a similar price on Amazon. I have to say Ugreen did a bad job in their stands.
customer_reviews.author: W. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great item for work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my ipad tablet so that I could read books at work. It works great! I gave stability a 4 star because if you put too much pressure while the pad is on it the part you can adjust will move. But overall this is perfect! It's lightweight, easy to use, easy to pack around with the tablet and you can't really see that you have while the tablet is on it. Overall really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Solid I Pad holder
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the third or fourth time I have purchased this Tablet stand holder. I bought this one for my aunt to use when she face times us. She had tried other means of propping up her IPad that didn't hold up as well as this Tablet stand holder. My only complaint is it's a little heavy, but then that is why it works so well.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Convenient.
customer_reviews.text: The stand is excellent in all aspects, except that it adjusts by detents, unlike the discontinued Anker stand that was infinitely adjustable with a spring-loaded hinge.
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: We’re in the middle of renovating our kitchen. There used to be a TV on the counter. We’ve switched to a floating shelf with this stand for our tablet. We can stream TV, music and I can reference my stored recipes all without losing counter space! The stand is sturdy and unobtrusive. I looked at many other stands but this one matches kitchen decor and can be folded up and put away neatly when we have visitors over. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Judy A Ascenzi

customer_reviews.title: It is an universal Tablet stand, very functional, and solid for a good price
customer_reviews.text: The universal stand is made of hard plastic and adjustable, yet very solid when holding my iPad 12.9 Pro, it works with Galaxy S 10.5 T800, Dell Venue 10 Pro – 5055, and with other tablets. There are rubber strips both inside and on the bottom of the curved piece that holds the tablet which keep the tablet from sliding in the stand, and the stand from sliding on the desk. The design is functional, universal, clean and unobtrusive, and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: blue rose

customer_reviews.title: Great and modern
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, reminds me of the old apple magic trackpad . Works great on my ipad pro 12.9 2020. It feels a little cheap but. Works great. The bottom of it is barely showing, which is what i was worried about, since You have to swipe form The bottom of the ipad to go to home screen.. But it was perfect. I got it today, so I don’t know how it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Iyad K.

customer_reviews.title: So portable!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I took mine when I visited my kids in Florida, and it ended up in the kitchen counter where the grandchildren sit to eat and watch You Tube on their phones. Every time I needed it, someone else was using it. I bought several of them for the kids and another for my daughter. These are great for both tablets and phones. I love that the tilt is adjustable, and I can close it and stick it inside my purse for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Zee Lugo

customer_reviews.title: Great stand for my iPad!
customer_reviews.text: When I received the UGreen Tablet Holder in the mail I was surprised and a bit concerned that it was smaller than I thought it would be and wouldn’t work well with my iPad Pro. However, once I set it on the counter and placed the iPad on it it worked perfectly. I especially like the different notches for upright to more gradual angles for viewing as well as the rubber inside the bottom groove to prevent the iPad from slipping off. Finally, its light weight, compact size, and it’s ability to flatten makes it ideal for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Starwood

customer_reviews.title: My favorite phone/tablet accessory
customer_reviews.text: I bring this little stand everywhere, it’s perfect for everything from reviewing notes on an iPad for school, to FaceTime on a phone, watching Netflix, glancing at recipes on a phone/iPad while cooking, etc. It’s compact and sturdy and travels nicely. Before I got it I would lean my phone/iPad on random surfaces and was always worried about falls, but this gadget keeps them stable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Fire 8 & More
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 of these stands for our new Fire HD 8 tablets and they are a perfect fit. Our small phone holders were not stable enough to hold the Fires in both portrait and landscape positions. These were shipped as promised and have no problems with them even though they are plastic. I would suggest this for the Apple Mini,any Fire or similar size tablet and I also tried my full size IPad and it is also a sturdy fit. I also used the stand to hold my steno pad when transcribing some notes. So many uses and so little time... This would be a good gift for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use this for all three of my iDevices
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little stand to use with my iPad mini while traveling, but it works just as well with my iPhone 7+ and my full-size iPad. I like that the viewing angle is almost infinitely adjustable, and that it folds flat for storage and travel. There's a non-slip pad both on the inside of the cradle (to protect your device) and the bottom of the front (to protect whatever it's standing on. My iPad mini fits into the stand while in its case, with the magnetic flap folded back.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G. Young

customer_reviews.title: I definitely do NOT recommend these.
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable gear is very flimsy and slides black as soon as you place anything on it, even just the tip of your fingers. I was able to super-glue mine together at the angle I wanted. But for this price point, I shouldn't have to. The quality itself is cheap plastic, like something you would find at a dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: The one to leave in the office
customer_reviews.text: Well its ok and does the job well. This stand has fix positions and notches into the available angles. There are 10 notched angels (about every 10 degrees). BUT, there are better ones out there . . .  Read the description carefully on both for what they describe AND what they leave out of the description.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Y.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile tablet holder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom, who wanted to watch TV on her tablet. She had suggested a foam stand, but those seemed to have only one angle (awkward). I really like this stand because (a) the angle is adjustable, allowing you to avert glare; and (b) the open sides and top allow all sizes of tablets, so if she gets a different sized tablet, she won't need a new stand. It's also lightweight and folds when you want to put it away. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deni B

customer_reviews.title: Great, easily transportable
customer_reviews.text: I have a Galaxy Tab 3S and this is a fantastic stand for it. I also have a detached keyboard and has the two set up in my motel room, when my computer-smart son walked in, he thought it was a laptop. Sometime when I'm sitting at my desk reading on my phone, I'll put it on the stand. It is great. I have a case that is supposed to hole it up, but takes too much room on my small desk, this is much better. Update, my computer smart son liked my stand so much, I gave mine to him and ordered another for myself. This is great
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Narrow and mostly plastic.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my tablet and I think it is too narrow and more suited for smartphones. Also, the material is mostly plastic, not aluminum. Due to the narrow profile, when I place my 10 inch tablet, this wobbles a lot and is not stable to use the touchscreen. If your intent is to simple watch and not touch while in place, then this might be a solution. Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Max™

customer_reviews.title: It’s small
customer_reviews.text: From the picture it looked like it would be bigger. I failed to check the dimensions. However it does work, looks nice and streamlined, and holds up my IPad on my lap reasonably well, although if it were a little bigger it would be more stable, especially for writing. It’s nice that the tilt is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Passignano

customer_reviews.title: Nice for Larger Phablets
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in addition to an ANKER I purchased to use with my Note 9 in the Otter Box Defender case. This holds the phone nicely in any position! That's really nice when in the vertical mode. While I have only used it at home a few times it does fit the bill. I only wish it were made of Aluminum instead of plastic. It's light but I have reservations on how long it will hold up when I start using it at work. Will update this down the road if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: PipeFighter

customer_reviews.title: Works great on a 10 inch tablet and it looks and feels nice
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that this might not be big enough to handle my 10in Fire tablet but I figured it would still be functional as a stand for a smaller tablet or phone. It handles the tablet just fine. The non-slip pad works perfectly. I like that it is adjustable over a range of angles not just 2 or 3 positions. I might have to buy another for the smaller tablet and phone as the larger 10in Tablet on the stand makes accessing Alexa easy from a distance and the sound with the 2 speakers facing upward is much better for such little speakers
customer_reviews.author: Jack_238

customer_reviews.title: Love this economical tablet stand
customer_reviews.text: I love this small, foldable easel for holding my iPad. I use it when I paint to hold my iPad. It is also handy to use in the kitchen when I am following a recipe on my iPad. Lastly, I love to watch Netflix in the tub. Perfect hands free holder so I can soak and enjoy binge watching at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: randy barron

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a sturdy stand to hold my new 10.1 Fire HD tablet. This is smaller than I expected but works great even in portrait mode!! It's strong and adjusts to just the right angle for me and exactly what I was looking for to use for all my zoom meetings! I will most likely be buying another one soon. Portable and very well made, totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: zany_catt

customer_reviews.title: Great little stand!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a stand for my iPad so I could stop looking down at it. I didn't want a bulky cover so I kept this on my desk and it has been great! It doubles as a phone stand too. The different angle settings is the BEST PART. There a small strip of silicone-like rubber both in the groove and on the exterior of the groove that keeps my iPad in place and from sliding around or from getting damaged by direct contact with the hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Stand!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand. It works for my Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8.0 and for my iPad 2 as well. In addition, I tried it on my husband's Kindle Fire and it works perfectly. I wish I would have purchased this long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Very functional!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stand. It clicks into place and does not move unless you move it. The padding at the bottom is great to protect your device and make sure it doesn't slide. It has multiple angles you can set it at. I sometimes charge my phone while it's sitting in it (turning it to the side.) Also works great to hold my phone when on a video call. Its a very handy and versatile stand.
customer_reviews.author: JNoel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kindle even with cover on folded.  Stand folds/opens easily
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Hold my phone and my Kindle Paperwhite. I use it mostly for reading on my Paperwhite so I don't have to use both hands. It fold flat and unfolds easily. I keep one next to where I read and it works great. Very pleased with not having to hold my Kindle to read as that can be bad for the shoulders and back as my doctor told me. So I looked for something to hold the Kindle for me. Perfect. BTW, my Kindle has a leather cover and still fits folded over in this stand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought one and liked it so much bought a 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: Have two of these in the kitchen to hold tablets and phones. Even though my tablet has a cover that props it up, I use this stand because it keeps the tablet off of the potentially food-covered counter and it has more adjustability in angle. The first one I bought has lasted years so quality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little stand. It works holding the iPad both vertically and horizontally, and even with a fairly decent sized case it works well, but it wouldn’t work with a super thick case. I love how adjustable it is too.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthless Sprinkle

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Ipad or Iphone holder that looks OEM
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought this on a recommendation from a youtuber and was pleasantly surprised how useful and good looking this is. Very stable and you have a lot of adjustments in the angle of view. Folds to a compact size, I would take it traveling for sure.
customer_reviews.author: pro photographer

customer_reviews.title: Flexible
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect desk accessory for holding anything you want to stand up. I use it for my phone, my Fire HD 8 and my Samsung 10" tab 4, all with cases. It holds them all. And it is adjustable so the screen angle is just where you want it to be. I may get a couple more, one for the table, one for the desk, one for work....hmmmm...where else?
customer_reviews.author: lochnez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stand
customer_reviews.text: I received this stand for Christmas and absolutely love it. I was so impressed that I got one for my husband! It holds an iPad or iPhone and is very stable. I use my iPad to display a recipe when I cook, and this stand works perfectly. I would recommend this item without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Sofie's Nana

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: The stand is very inexpensive, but it is so strong and stable that it barely moves when I firmly push the power button on my 10 inch tablet and doesn't move at all when I use the tablet's touch screen. Excellent value for the very low price!!!
customer_reviews.author: lsr

customer_reviews.title: Such a simple, great thing...
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPad that I like to keep in my kitchen and use as a "recipe book" as I cook. This stand is PERFECT for that job. Also, it is a great place to keep the iPad when not in use, but you want to have it handy. Occasionally, I use a detached bluetooth keyboard when using the iPad, and this props it up beautifully for typing.
customer_reviews.author: Xioo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Great quality, sturdy, looks nice and perfect size. I have a 10.9 iPad and this perfectly suits my needs and will be ordering another to have in a second room. I love also that the stand is completely non distracting when the iPad is on the stand. I like to use it to hold up the iPad when I listen to music on my favorite app, calm.com during my work day.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: It's small, but solid.
customer_reviews.text: This is a slick little stand. I've been using it for my phone and Kindle. It folds and unfolds easily, making it easy to take back and forth from home to office. It is well made; it has positive stops so you can use it at whatever angle you want. It's very slim when closed. I hardly notice it in my back pack.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great design. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Amazon Fire tablet. I love it. Very solid and sturdy. Looks fantastic on my desk. I’m able to scoot it back and forth with tablet resting on it and it never folds or changes shape. It’s big enough to use in my lap when I’m in bed. My friend saw it and bought two. He uses one in his car for his lunch break. Plan to buy the smaller one for my phone. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Effie Beatrice

customer_reviews.title: Small and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Love this little gadget for use with my iPad, even watching movie sitting on the sofa is made more comfortable. The multiple angle feature is very useful and make it more versatile. The fact that it folds flat and you can carry it with you is also a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Hada

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stand for my tablet
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this stand. I use it for my 12.3" tablet & cell phone. It's sturdy, lightweight, easy to use & love the design. Great quality and I'm glad that it's available in white. Angle can be easily adjusted. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nature's Best

customer_reviews.title: Not what I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought. It is okay, but spend your money elsewhere. It just is too small for my IPad.
customer_reviews.author: Iamawalrus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect support for my iPad
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand for use with my iPad, and I've given them for gifts. It's stable, sturdy, easy to open and close, and easy to adjust to different angles. Supports the iPad well in both portrait and landscape positions. The curved lip makes it a little bit awkward for carrying in my handbag, but it fits easily, and I often carry it with me. AND it's very reasonably priced. What else is there?
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold my iPad Pro 11 and it does an okay job. I just wish it had an extension on it to lift it up to a higher setting as am looking for something that seats higher on my table. Other than that it's okay.....not outstanding, but okay.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Not for using in bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stand to use it while netflixing in bed. It's not good for that purpose. I guess it is good enough to use on hard surfaces like a desk or a table, but I didn't buy it for that purpose. If that is what you want it for, go ahead, it will do a good job for you.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam B.

customer_reviews.title: Great stand for iPad and iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand. It works great with my iPad pro as well as my iPhone Pro Max. The materials are hard plastic that looks good. I went with white and it stand out on my home work station. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Osgood

customer_reviews.title: The BEST.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get enough of these. They are so very well made and wide enough to hold all of my 10+ inch tablets, 7 inch tablets and 6.4 inch cell. They adjust to many slants and the bottom of the front holder has a non-slip insert to prevent sliding. They are VERY WELL PRICED, sturdy (better than a well known brand) that is not as wide! Just push in the two side circle on top and slant to your perfect slant. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: carolineTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet stand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these stands for our tablets. One for a 7" kindle fire and one for an 8" kindle fire. They are great. They are multi-angle so you can choose which is best for your own needs.
customer_reviews.author: lori u

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I like this little stand. I like it so much I bought a 2nd one! It securely holds my iPad when I'm sitting at the table. I thought it might tip over but it doesn't. It's lightweight but still heavy enough to hold it up. I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Great stand
customer_reviews.text: Love this stand so much, I bought a second. It’s affordable, so I can have one in the home office and dining table. Holds phone or iPad easily. Adjustable angle. I would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great with thick cases like Kids Kindle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the kids Kindle Fire with its ginormous thick case, and it works perfectly. (We have a slightly older version that doesn’t have a built-in stand.) It also works great with our phones when streaming something or FaceTiming.
customer_reviews.author: Lan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect stand! So easy to open even for my little girls
customer_reviews.author: Cris-tall

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I thought it was going to be bigger, but turned out to be pretty small. Surprisingly, it still works and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: amazonie

customer_reviews.title: Good for iPad Pro 11-inch
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and stability when using it with the 11-inch iPad Pro in either orientation. The adjustability is nice, and it folds small enough for stashing in a bag. My only complaint is that the rear leg slides around a little too easily--an improved version of this product would include some non-slip material on the bottom of the rear leg.
customer_reviews.author: Doug W.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: After I just purchased a new phone, my smaller stand just didn't do well holding these longer phones. This my friends is a perfect stand. This stand is stable and can be used with an iPad or other tablet. It works great and is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: PeanutFL

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my mom for her iPad since her case that's supposed to work as a stand wasn't very stable. This tablet stand is a lot smaller than the other large stand she already had in the kitchen, so it takes up less space and is easier to move around where ever she decides to sit. It's very sturdy and easy to adjust; super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, sturdy tablet/phone/Kindle holder. Solid plastic. I wish I’d have thought of buying it years ago! UPDATE: I have now had my tablet stand for 18 months. It is just as durable and solid as the day I got it. There is no weakness in the plastic what so ever. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Rose

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a flimsier, more mobile tablet stand. I use this to hold an iPad by my bed at night, where I often watch video on it as I fall asleep. It is study and doesn't move. The rubber strip at the bottom keeps it from sliding around on my nightstand, which is a big improvement over the one I had before. I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jcg878

customer_reviews.title: Great little multi purpose stand
customer_reviews.text: This is great for holding my large phone but also for a variety of things one might want to keep close at hand, standing. I use them for a variety of purposes; their compact design and adjustable stand, which controls the height, make it a very versatile device.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate for iPad Pro 12.9" tablet
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this tablet stand for my iPad Pro 12.9" tablet, but the stand kept collapsing under the weight of the tablet in the Portrait orientation. While it may work fine for smaller tablets and phones, be aware of this limitation if you have a very large tablet.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorQ

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these and they are worth it! Very sturdy and can be adjusted to whatever angle you need. I have a pop socket on my iPhone 8plus and i can still use this. I also bought the larger one for iPads and they are just as sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma S

customer_reviews.title: Its an ok stand but doesnt allow for charging.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job and holds up my Samsung S4 tablet but I needed to be placed vertical and still be able to charge. I didnt even realize this until I placed the tablet and remembered the charging dock is on the bottom. So this does not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable for larger heavy tablets used in portrait mode
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use on Samsung Tab E tablets and iPad 5's. The weight and extended height of the tablets cause the stand to collapse. The tablets have to be close to 90 degrees for the stands to be stable. The self-locking notches that is part of the rotary hinge tend to slip easily. Horizontal mode they are mostly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Schmoe

customer_reviews.title: Most important to know is that it's plastic, not metal.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a metal stand some time ago, thought this was the same (didn't read the description carefully, enough). This stand ends up being very light and flimsy in comparison. It's, however, functional, and I will keep it. The price was right... so I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ranveig

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller than it looks
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have looked to see if the dimensions of this thing were specified. It is super, super small. Also, it does not stay on the higher setting. It seems to only stay at the lowest angle. I just received this today so that is all I know so far..
customer_reviews.author: 808Louise

customer_reviews.title: Great, quality built, yet inexpensive device stand.
customer_reviews.text: Great, quality built, yet inexpensive device stand. Supports my ipad pro 10.5 as easily as my phone. There is a rubber foot along the curved edge to keep it from slipping open further or sliding off of surfaces. Great looking metal accents on the hinge. I like that it's collapsable so I can take it with me if needed, but this will live on my desk most likely.
customer_reviews.author: 311IO7

customer_reviews.title: Useful, but you can't charge your iphone while you use this
customer_reviews.text: I like using this to read with my iphone or mini ipad. However, be aware that you can't charge your phone while you use it since the plug for charging the iphone is at the bottom and there's not a cut-out in the bottom lip of the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Deah Hester

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust and transport
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my IPad Pro 10.5. Kept buying cases with stands attached and decided to try a versatile stand. This works great because it’s totally adjustable to the angle/tilt you want. It collapses flat in the back so you can easily transport it. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CillacellaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good simple stand
customer_reviews.text: I don't have much to say about this - it works for holding up my iPad when I watching something or following a recipe. It adjusts. It seems durable enough!
customer_reviews.author: B. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stand!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how sturdy this little thing is. I didn’t expect much due to the price, but this thing is awesome! I use it everyday, and have to buy more for my husband and kids.
customer_reviews.author: amiller

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and so handy!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is absolutely amazing! Are use it to prop up my cell phone and great for propping up my iPad mini when I pull up a recipe at the kitchen counter. It’s very sturdy, adjustable, and it stays in place. It is not the typical piece of junk that we are having to settle for these days
customer_reviews.author: KS Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I figured it might be a little flimsy or not made to last, but I expect this little guy to last a few years easy. The plastic feels sturdy, the mechanism feels like it will not wear easily, and the nice rubber shoe thing keeps my ipad stable. The range on it is also great, and it seems to work fine whether it is on my lap, on one knee, or on my bed.
customer_reviews.author: cody clark

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I've used this holder for quite a while and it has performed well holding my iPad (approx 9.5 x 7.25 inches). It supports the iPad and holds the angle (adjustable) very well. It also holds the iPad without allowing it to slip out of the holder, even when I've bumped it a few times. I really like this holder.
customer_reviews.author: Operations Rick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for iPads!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for school online meetings on iPads, and this works perfectly to hold the device! I pad is in a thin case and fits great in holder.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda J.

product_meta.title: UGREEN Tablet Stand Holder Adjustable Compatible for iPad 10.2 2019, iPad Pro 11 Inch 2020, iPad 9.7 2018, iPad Mini 5 4 3 2, iPad Air, Nintendo Switch, iPhone 11 Pro Max SE XS XR X 8 Plus 7 6 (White)
feature_bullets: Compatibility: For 4 to 11 inch tablet, cell phone and E-reader with Max thickness of 0.55" (including its case). Compatible for Apple iPad 9.7 inch, iPad 10.2" 2019, iPad Pro 11-inch 2020, iPad mini 2 3 4 5 Wi-Fi, iPad Air 2, Nintendo Switch Lite, Samsung Galaxy Tab S5e S4 S3 S2, Tab A E 9.6, iPhone 11 Pro Max, the new iPhone SE 2020, iPhone XR X XS 8 Plus 6 7 6S, Samsung Note20 S20 Ultra S10 S9 S8 Note 10 9 8 android phones.

Portable and Light-Weighted: With small size of 4.7" x 4.2", UGREEN handy tablet holder for ipad is foldable and easy to slip into your pocket for travel. You can easily place this ipad stand on the desktop of your kitchen, office, living room, bedroom, etc.

Multi-Angle Adjustable: Directly adjust to your preferred angle from 15° to 100°. UGREEN desktop stand for tablet can hold your smartphone or tablet at a comfortable angle, ideal for watching videos, reading, recording, browsing, facetime call and more.
Sturdy and Durable: Premium ABS material supports this tablet stand for desk durable in usage. Silicone pads on the bottom and cradle protect both your tablet and stand from sliding and scratches.
What You Get: 1x UGREEN adjustable tablet stand for ipad.
